repositories.brief_summary: Major new language feature (labeled tuples) and several stdlib additions including priority queues, string utilities, and API improvements
repositories.new_features_summary: Labeled tuples, new Pqueue module, String edit distance and spellcheck functions, Either.get_left/get_right, Uchar UTF-8 utilities
repositories.new_features:
- **Labeled tuples** syntax added to the language allowing optional labels on tuple fields for improved code clarity ([#13498](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13498))
- New **Pqueue module** added to stdlib implementing priority queues with min/max heap operations and polymorphic variants ([#12871](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/12871))
- **String.edit_distance** and **String.spellcheck** functions for computing edit distance and finding spelling corrections ([#13760](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13760))
- **Either.get_left** and **Either.get_right** functions for extracting values from Either types with exceptions on mismatch ([#13768](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13768))
- **Uchar.utf_8_decode_length_of_byte** and **Uchar.max_utf_8_decode_length** functions for UTF-8 byte length analysis ([#13796](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13796))
- **Format.utf_8_scalar_width** function renamed from `utf8_scalar_width` for consistent naming ([#13794](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13794))
- **Sys.getenv_opt** reimplemented to preserve backtraces when returning None ([#13727](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13727))
- **Software prefetching support** enabled for ARM64, s390x, PPC64 and RiscV architectures to speed up GC operations ([#13582](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13582))

- **String.edit_distance** and **String.spellcheck** functions for computing edit distance and finding spelling corrections ([ocaml/ocaml#13760](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13760))

- **Uchar.utf_8_decode_length_of_byte** and **Uchar.max_utf_8_decode_length** functions for UTF-8 byte length analysis ([ocaml/ocaml#13796](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13796))

group_summaries.group_overview:
- **Major language evolution** with labeled tuples representing the most significant syntax addition, complemented by formal governance establishment through the OCaml Language Committee
- **Comprehensive stdlib expansion** including priority queues, string processing utilities, UTF-8 functions, and improved Either type support across multiple practical domains
- **Performance and reliability improvements** with software prefetching enabled for ARM64, s390x, PPC64 and RiscV architectures, plus enhanced build system reliability
- **Governance modernization** through formation of 9-member Language Committee following GHC model to address consensus challenges in language evolution ([ocaml/RFCs#51](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs/issues/51))
group_summaries.activity_summary: Type system enhancements, compiler optimizations, build system improvements, and formal governance structure establishment
group_summaries.activity:
